resources.string: Check these integration options. From simple to full payment flows.
This payment flow checks credit card data entered by the user against payment method rules.
This payment flow allows saved cards selection.
Payment flow with installments and card issuers management.
This payment flow includes off-line payment methods.
Default payment flow. Includes every payment module.
You can collect data through a few screens or use an unique form that will automatically fill the most it can.
A bank selection screen can be added to the simple flow, or use the guessing form.
Tip: if you need to accept off-line payment methods, do not enable the guessing form, since it discards them.
If only cards are accepted and a new one is needed, you can collect data through a few screens or use an unique form that will automatically fill the most it can.
Default Payment Flow. Collecting card data info, installments, token, payment and congrats. You can pay with MercadoPago app too.
